name: Soldier Run
description:
Soldier Run is a game where you run away of viruses.

If you get hit by a virus your warmth goes down. If the soldiers warmth is 0 you will die. But you can heal, all around the map there are campfires. They give +80 warmth if you hit them. After surviving for 2:20 minutes a boss will spawn.

Keep in mind that this game is in development and is made for a game jam.

Hope you enjoy the game. Feedback is welcome.
